column5: check out this story. talk about territorial. wow. http://www.sun-sentinel.com/news/loc...news%2Dbroward

That is to say in the boat that fired the shot. Boat A was there 1st, and fishing, boat B roars up and starts confrontation. Boat A goes to leave and total nutjob in boat B fires a shot?!?!?!?! I tell you what, if I was in Boat A I would soon own everything the gunman in boat B owned as the civil suits would be HUGE and well publicized. I would not rest til that Jackwipe wass living in a cardboard box under a bridge somewhere. The gun man needs some serious jail time, counciling and he needs to surrender all his belongings to the guys in boat A.
Ft. Lauderdale Florida is a LONG way from Canada.
